channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Pak System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Pak System

item.title: CVE-2020-4910|2024-08-04T08:14:59.172Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 191274.

item.title: CVE-2020-4919|2024-08-04T08:14:59.161Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 has insufficient logout controls which could allow an authenticated privileged user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 191395.

item.title: CVE-2020-4918|2024-08-04T08:14:59.149Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 could allow l local privileged user to disclose sensitive information due to an insecure direct object reference in sell service console for the Platform System Manager. IBM X-Force ID: 191392.

item.title: CVE-2020-4913|2024-08-04T08:14:59.127Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 could reveal credential information in the HTTP response to a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 191288.

item.title: CVE-2020-4912|2024-08-04T08:14:59.202Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 Self Service Console could allow a privilege escalation by capturing the user request URL when logged in as a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 191287.

item.title: CVE-2020-4916|2024-08-04T08:14:59.164Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 191390.

item.title: CVE-2020-4917|2024-08-04T08:14:59.242Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 191391.

item.title: CVE-2020-4928|2024-08-04T08:14:59.129Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 could allow a local privileged attacker to upload arbitrary files. By intercepting the request and modifying the file extention, the attacker could execute arbitrary code on the server. IBM X-Force ID: 191705.

item.title: CVE-2020-4909|2024-08-04T08:14:59.109Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 191273.
